headline: Tracking Ron Baron's BAMCO Portfolio - Q3 2025 Update
summary: Ron Baron's BAMCO, Inc. 13F portfolio rose to $37.71B in Q3 2025. Read more about stake increases and decreases and the largest position in the portfolio here.

headline: Is Charles Schwab Fairly Priced After TD Ameritrade Integration and 2025 Share Rally?
summary: If you have been wondering whether Charles Schwab is still a buy at around $94 a share, you are not alone; the stock sits at an interesting crossroads between quality and price. After climbing 27.7% year to date and 15.9% over the last year, the shares have cooled slightly with a 1.0% dip over the past month but remain up 2.4% in the last week, which hints that sentiment is still broadly constructive. Recent headlines have focused on Schwab's ongoing integration of TD Ameritrade and its...

headline: Evaluating Charles Schwab’s (SCHW) Valuation as Client Trading Activity Rises for a Sixth Straight Month
summary: The latest Schwab Trading Activity Index reading, which climbed for a sixth straight month in November, puts Charles Schwab (SCHW) in an interesting spot for investors watching client behavior and the stock’s recent drift. See our latest analysis for Charles Schwab. That backdrop of strong client engagement helps explain why, even after some recent choppiness, Charles Schwab’s $94.28 share price sits on a solid footing, with a robust year to date share price return and healthy multi year...
